Address.label: Address
Address.value: 585 WEST BEACH STREET, WATSONVILLE, California, 95076, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Granite Construction Inc delivers infrastructure solutions for public and private clients in North America. It primarily focuses on heavy civil infrastructure projects, including roads, highways, tunnels and other infrastructure-related projects, transit facilities, airports and bridges. In addition, the company performs site preparation and infrastructure services for residential development, energy progress and other facilities. Its operating segment includes Construction and Materials. The company generates maximum revenue from Construction segment.

value.name: James A. Radich
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
